text: Zaslawskaye reservoir is a man-made lake on the northwestern edge of Minsk, Belarus. It is located at N 53° 58' 51.24" E 27° 23' 3.12". http://www.allaboutcountries.com/latlng/y4ds6/zaslawskaye-vadaskhovishcha- latitude-longitude-minskaja-voblasts-belarus It is also sometimes known as the Minsk Sea. It is about 5 km by 3 1/2 km. ==References== Category:Lakes of Belarus Category:Minsk
title: Zaslawskaye Reservoir
